name: Fearsome Creatures
description:
TW: blood & implied death

You don’t know where you are, who you are, or even what you are. You do know that there is something following you, and you will need to choose which of the fearsome critters to be your allies, and which to be your enemies. With more than ten ways to meet your demise or salvation, your choices are life-or-death.

Credits:

Taksin Mann: Programming and Project Management 

Emma Millin: Narrative Lead and Writing 

Lucy Gold: Art and Programming 

Jude Corkren: Programming and Art 

Alexander Antaya: Music Composer
